* Iron Raptor snarled as she entered the Lion and Dragon room, who said 
anything about Tigerhawk saving her? If she got into trouble then she was 
more then ready to accept the consequences, she wouldn't have used her 
Second Beast Mode against Rampage if she didn't!
She walked into the room and looked at the books that lined the shelves, 
there were just so many how could she find the one that she was looking for?
Iron Raptor began to look at the titles of the books, seeing if she could 
find that one in particular that she needed.
She saw Plintissa in the corner of her optic...*

" Just remember not to touch the black box, alright?"

* Iron Raptor finally saw the one that she was looking for and pulled the 
book out of the shelf, it was black and had a silver binding.
Golden letters spelled out the title on the cover:
BOOK OF SHADOWS!
She smiled and set the book on a desk, it was old and ancient. Just as she 
knew it would be!
Iron Raptor snarled with satisfaction, she had searched for years for a book 
such as this and now it was in her grasp! Finally!
She looked at the latch that held the book closed and say carvings upon it, 
this book was opened by magic!
Many bot's no longer believed in such things as magic and thought that there 
was never such a thing...but there was!
Iron Raptor looked at the carvings and translated them in her system, she 
then said it out loud...*
" Carnivorous, herbavorous!'
* She watched and to her delight the latch popped open, this book held 
secrets that even the smartest mind couldn't comprehend!
Iron Raptor opened the book very carefully and smiled as she saw that the 
pages were empty...or so they seemed!*
